Text.Page: The {@LinkCreature:32#4#Sihran ragers} and their {@LinkCreature:32#5#tuwangi thumpers} keep our armies at a distance and protect their supply chains. Take them out, and bring me their tags. We'll make sure Kaidun knows what he's lost.
I wish I could see the look on that traitor, Kaidun's, face when he hears his elites are all dead.
Eliminate the {@LinkCreature:32#4#Sihran ragers} and {@LinkCreature:32#5#tuwangi thumpers} and bring me their tags.
